headline: From Apple to GM, Tariffs to Cost Companies Tens of Billions

headline: Toyota Sees $1.3 Billion Profit Hit in Two Months on Tariffs

headline: 3 Cash-Producing Stocks Facing Headwinds
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
